actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill providing for cost-sharing modifications of the Corpus Christi Ship Canal project.

summary.text: Modifies the Corpus Christi ship canal project in Texas to require that non-Federal interests agree to contribute 25 percent of the construction costs of the project. Authorizes a waiver of such requirement by the Secretary of the Army upon a finding by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency that specified environmental protection requirements are met.

titles.title: A bill providing for cost-sharing modifications of the Corpus Christi Ship Canal project.
